about_the_game:
Background: In the fictional fantasy continent, there are two countries, Red and Blue. Due to territorial disputes, the two countries engaged in a prolonged war that lasted for ten years, later known as the Ten Years' War.

This war caused countless deaths and also gave birth to heroes in troubled times - Red Headed Suka, a brave and skilled female general from the Red Country. Under her leadership, the Red Country ultimately won the difficult ten-year battle.

While the people cheered and celebrated the end of the war, little did they know that the consequences had already begun. Red haired Suka, who had returned to the fields from armor, was ambushed by a group of unknown assassins. She was seriously injured and had to constantly flee to avoid the pursuit of the assassins. In the end, she collapsed due to exhaustion.

Waking up again, red haired Suka arrived at a strange place where greenery was lush and the breeze was constant. Where was this? Why did she come here? What kind of adventure will Suka embark on in this place? What other unknown stories are about to unfold?

Game Overview: This is a semi open world ARPG game with HD2D pixel style. In the game, players will play the role of the story protagonist - Red haired Suka, embarking on an exciting adventure in a beautiful continent called Wind Canyon. During the journey, you will encounter interesting NPC characters and encounter obstacles from powerful enemies and dangerous traps. As you continue to explore, you will also uncover the unknown stories of this continent, find rich and powerful equipment and skills, and thus drive the progress of the game.

Game Core:

1. Explore the wonderful world of HD2D

The game is constructed in a semi open world, providing players with ample exploration pleasure. The game style is designed and constructed using HD2D+3D, presenting a unique retro visual style. The application of micro perspectives deepens the immersion of the game.

2. Collect rich equipment to enhance oneself

There are many powerful and unique equipment props scattered throughout the game. Exploring the world and collecting these equipment props can enhance oneself. Some equipment props also have an unknown story that players need to explore.

3. Fight against powerful enemies

There are many powerful dark creatures lurking in the Wind Canyon, ready to attack you at any time. Don't be afraid of the darkness, take up weapons to defeat them, and have the opportunity to obtain rich spoils of war.

4. Explore the stories behind the characters

Bonds? Hatred? Or some other unknown story? In addition to the main storyline of Suka, there are also exciting non main storyline hidden in some characters or specific props in the game. Digging into them will provide a more comprehensive understanding of what happens in the Wind Canyon.

The game has a small scale and is dedicated to telling a story about courage and redemption. We hope that friends who feel this story can gain inner strength from it and overcome difficulties and obstacles in life!

Also welcome to contact the author for feedback, collaboration, or discussion.
